model.name: Classic Damier Piqué Polo
model.disambiguatingDescription: Featuring an iconic polo shirt silhouette, this Classic Damier Piqué Polo is tailored from compact cotton piqué with a subtle Damier effect. It is now available in the season’s signature Bright Blue colorway.

• 100% Cotton
  • Blue
  • Regular Fit
  • Model wears a FR M size

  • Made in Italy
